trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Atlantic City
There were no other sightings in Atlantic City on or around April 1st 2009
Summary: Orb shaped falling in sky orange light color with white smoke trailing behind it.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding in back of flagship Hotel looking toward gardners basin way object was falling straight down.In view for 5 seconds then lost behind houses.Object was orb shaped burning orange color white smoke trailing behind. The back of hotel is on St. Kathriens st facing about south and if you are looking at gardners basin you may be looking south east. this was reported to me by a coworker who wishes to not be involved she was behind flagship smoking a cigarett and saw object falling. The time was 2:15 pm on 04-01-09. Would like to know if any one else saw object. thank you
